languages.text: {n}Шорох синтетической ткани заполняет комнату. Все блюстители демонстрируют свои шинели. Все, кроме Хротко. Под взглядами товарищей Хротко флегматично пожимает плечами:{/n} "Я ее не ношу. Блюститель должен уметь терпеть холод, а синт-шинель служит для серфов знаком слабости".

{n}The rustle of synthetic fabric fills the room. All the enforcers show their coats... except Hrotko. He shrugs complacently under the gaze of his comrades.{/n} "I do not wear it. An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."
languages.original_text: {n}Шорох синтетической ткани заполняет комнату. Все блюстители демонстрируют свои шинели. Все, кроме Хротко. Под взглядами товарищей Хротко флегматично пожимает плечами:{/n} "Я ее не ношу. Блюститель должен уметь терпеть холод, а синт-шинель служит для серфов знаком слабости".

An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."

languages.text: {n}Das Rascheln synthetischer Stoffe erfüllt den Raum. Alle Enforcer präsentieren ihre Mäntel ... nur Hrotko nicht. Er zuckt unter den Blicken seiner Kameraden nur selbstgefällig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich trage ihn nicht. Ein Enforcer muss in der Lage sein, der Kälte zu widerstehen, und die Sklaven betrachten Synthetikmäntel als Zeichen von Schwäche."
languages.original_text: {n}The rustle of synthetic fabric fills the room. All the enforcers show their coats... except Hrotko. He shrugs complacently under the gaze of his comrades.{/n} "I do not wear it. An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Rascheln synthetischer Stoffe erfüllt den Raum. Alle Enforcer präsentieren ihre Mäntel ... nur Hrotko nicht. Er zuckt unter den Blicken seiner Kameraden nur selbstgefällig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich trage ihn nicht. Ein Enforcer muss in der Lage sein, der Kälte zu widerstehen, und die Sklaven betrachten Synthetikmäntel als Zeichen von Schwäche."

languages.text: {n}La pièce s'emplit du bruissement de tissus synthétiques alors que tous les prévôts s'empressent de montrer leur manteau... sauf Hrotko. Sentant le poids du regard de ses camarades, il se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « Je ne le porte pas. Un prévôt se doit d'être capable de résister au froid, et les serfs voient les manteaux synthétiques comme un signe de faiblesse. »
languages.original_text: {n}The rustle of synthetic fabric fills the room. All the enforcers show their coats... except Hrotko. He shrugs complacently under the gaze of his comrades.{/n} "I do not wear it. An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}La pièce s'emplit du bruissement de tissus synthétiques alors que tous les prévôts s'empressent de montrer leur manteau... sauf Hrotko. Sentant le poids du regard de ses camarades, il se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « Je ne le porte pas. Un prévôt se doit d'être capable de résister au froid, et les serfs voient les manteaux synthétiques comme un signe de faiblesse. »

languages.text: {n}El ruido de los tejidos sintéticos llena la sala. Todos los guardias muestran sus abrigos... excepto Hrotko. El hombre se encoge de hombros bajo la atenta mirada de sus compañeros.{/n} «Yo nunca me lo pongo. Un guardia debe ser capaz de resistir el frío, y los siervos consideran que los abrigos sintéticos son una muestra de debilidad».
languages.original_text: {n}The rustle of synthetic fabric fills the room. All the enforcers show their coats... except Hrotko. He shrugs complacently under the gaze of his comrades.{/n} "I do not wear it. An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}El ruido de los tejidos sintéticos llena la sala. Todos los guardias muestran sus abrigos... excepto Hrotko. El hombre se encoge de hombros bajo la atenta mirada de sus compañeros.{/n} «Yo nunca me lo pongo. Un guardia debe ser capaz de resistir el frío, y los siervos consideran que los abrigos sintéticos son una muestra de debilidad».

languages.text: {n}化学繊維のバサバサという音が部屋中に響く。エンフォーサー全員が自分のコートを見せた…フロトコを除いて。彼は仲間たちの視線を浴びつつ、悦に入った顔で肩をすくめる。{/n}「私は着ていませんよ。エンフォーサーは寒さに耐えなければなりませんし、農奴たちはシンセコートを弱さの印とみなしてますからね」
languages.original_text: {n}The rustle of synthetic fabric fills the room. All the enforcers show their coats... except Hrotko. He shrugs complacently under the gaze of his comrades.{/n} "I do not wear it. An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}化学繊維のバサバサという音が部屋中に響く。エンフォーサー全員が自分のコートを見せた…フロトコを除いて。彼は仲間たちの視線を浴びつつ、悦に入った顔で肩をすくめる。{/n}「私は着ていませんよ。エンフォーサーは寒さに耐えなければなりませんし、農奴たちはシンセコートを弱さの印とみなしてますからね」

languages.text: {n}合成纤维织物的沙沙声充满了房间，所有执法者都取出了自己的外套……只有赫洛卡除外。在周围人的注视下，他得意地耸了耸肩。{/n}“我不穿这种东西。身为执法者，必须靠自己的力量抵御寒冷，那些农奴会把合成外套视为软弱的标志。”
languages.original_text: {n}The rustle of synthetic fabric fills the room. All the enforcers show their coats... except Hrotko. He shrugs complacently under the gaze of his comrades.{/n} "I do not wear it. An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."

languages.text: {n}Sentetik kumaşın hışırtısı, tüm odayı dolduruyor. Tüm infazcılar kabanlarını gösterirken... Hrotko göstermiyor. Yoldaşlarının bakışları altında ilgisizce omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Ben kaban giymem. İnfazcı dediğinizin soğuğa dayanabilmesi gerekir. Köleler de sentetik kabanları zayıflık emaresi olarak görüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The rustle of synthetic fabric fills the room. All the enforcers show their coats... except Hrotko. He shrugs complacently under the gaze of his comrades.{/n} "I do not wear it. An enforcer must be able to withstand the cold, and the serfs treat synth-coats as a sign of weakness."
